overview: When they are framed for an act of vandalism in their church, Traz and his altar boy pals are plunged head first into a summer full of church-cleaning, repent, uncertainty... and ULTIMATE FRISBEE! Forced to work as a team with a nerd, a fat kid, a lonely goth, a foreigner, and the ever-miffed Jason, Traz faces the ULTIMATE challenge of bringing together this rag-tag group of wacky characters to overcome their rivals, the evil Yacht Club team. Hilarity and hijinks await in this ULTIMATE sendup to the classic 80's sports movie!
title: Disc
